CMUOperations.description:
Enter 1 to do action. Empty - do nothing.			
		doCMUExport: Run CMU Operations.
		doCMUClone: full copy of CMU data from source to target.
		doCMUCheck: compare difference between target and source.
		doCMUBackup: create bundle with full CMU data on target server.
		bundleStoreLocation: location  to store bundle. Default value(empty): store in the same folder, where JAR file is.
